scripts.build: npm run build_backend && npm run build_frontend
scripts.build_frontend: npx sass frontend/saas:out/public && node -e "const fs = require('node:fs/promises');fs.mkdir('./out/public', { recursive: true }).then(() => { fs.copyFile('./frontend/index.html', './out/public/index.html') }).then(() => { fs.copyFile('./frontend/script.js', './out/public/script.js') })"
